{{help
|topic=+travel
|detail=See some of the places available on the grid and travel to them.
|example=
* '''+travel''' - see a list of categories of locations
* '''+travel <category>''' - find out what's available in a category
* '''+travel <key>''' - travel to a location

==== If you own a location you can also: ====

* '''+travel/add <location>=<key>''' - add a location you own to +travel.
* '''+travel/rem <location>=<key>''' - remove a location you own from +travel.
* '''+travel/cat <location>=<category>''' - set a location's category.
* '''+travel/addcat <location>=<category>''' - add additional categories. For example, a location might be a bar AND a restaurant.
* '''+travel/remcat <location>=<category>''' - get rid of a category on your location.

==== Staff commands: ====

* '''+travel/addcat <category>''' - create a new category
* '''+travel/remcat <category>''' - delete a travel category
